article_text: The two leading candidates for governor squared off in their first televised debate on Spanish-language Telemundo, and repeated the same message: The other guy is worse than me.

article_metadata.title: Tense exchanges, zingers, clear differences in debate between Gov. Rick Scott and Charlie Crist | Miami Herald
